///TUTORIAL SCREEN Try Fobbu RSA ( Road Side Assistance ) on road, at home, at work, or on travel\nnever be stranded… ODS ODS Live Track ( On Demand Services ) turn your Vehicle repair/service into\ntap driven experience, effective and fun…
Lsd ( Local Steal Deals ) big savings from tons of local offers and\ndiscount customized only for you…
Keep Driving, be Safe… ready to experience the whole new\nway you drive your vehicle ?

///RSA SCREEN Flat\nTyre Battery\nJump Start Vehicle\nEmergency Road Side Assistance Please select your service request What\'s keeping you stranded ? Hello Flat Tyre? No Worries Burst Tyre? No Worries Few pics please ! Mind it you upload your vehicle pics :) Double Trouble ! No worries Dead Battery? No Worries Empty Tank? No Worries we will deliver real quick !
